attributes.action: Blunt tips on all newly manufactured domestic knives to reduce fatalities
attributes.additional_details:
Many knife attacks, particularly impulsive acts of violence, involve readily available kitchen knives. After reading an article about Idris Elba discussing the dangers of sharp-tipped knives, I discovered that a manufacturer has already taken the initiative to design and sell blunt-edged kitchen knives at a reasonable price. This demonstrates that safer alternatives are both viable and accessible.

A rounded or blunt tip would make kitchen knives significantly less effective as weapons while maintaining their full functionality for cooking. By implementing this legislation, the government can take a proactive step toward reducing knife-related harm, ultimately making homes and communities safer for everyone.
attributes.background: Violent crimes involving kitchen knives have risen, with stabbings and assaults often using sharp-tipped knives. Unlike professional blades, household knives don't need a sharp point for food prep. A blunt-tip design would maintain cooking function while reducing the risk of lethal attacks.
